About

Provide your recipients with a quick an easy way to let you know they got your package, providing you with the most direct delivery confirmation.

Print and Pack

Customize and print your QR codes. Slip it in your package. And ship it off.

Scan

The recipient opens the package, pulls out the QR code slip, and scans with any code reader smartphone app.

Confirm

As soon as their phone scans the code, you’ll be notified.
